bio: Fontaine is a spellsword conjurer who comes to Robbers Refuge after the player sends out letters advertising the tavern. He has no time for teaching, and instead prefers to focus on the thrill of fighting. He trained as a swordsman, but his real talent is conjuration. He loves summoning atronachs, but also falls back summong wolves when low on magicka. He is not afraid of getting hit in a fight.
name: Fontaine
